title: MOOC Learning Engagement Enhancement Strategy Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in online education platforms and experience in social studies instruction
context.additional_context: Exploring Methods to Foster Social Interaction and Sustained Learning Engagement in MOOC Environments for Pre-Service and In-Service Teachers

learning_goals: Based on participation pattern analysis of MOOC learners, three or more strategies to enhance engagement can be designed.
A research trends analysis report on MOOC participation is written by applying systematic literature mapping methods.
A social constructivist-based instructional design applicable to online asynchronous environments is developed.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
